text: chrissy metz of ` ` This Is Us [ VIDEO ]'' is a fan favorite. She recently decided to write her own book and now E! Online is talking about how Chrissy feels like writing this book was very ` ` therapeutic'' for her. This new book is called ` ` This Is Me'' and in it, Chrissy opens up about a lot of things that the fans of ` ` This Is Us'' don't know about her already. Chrissy opens up In this book, Chrissy Metz really does open up even going as far as talking about being abused as a child.
